description:
This episode I share my thoughts on the using paper minis vs using 3D minis. I talk about why I havn't done a tutorial on paper minis, even though they are a large part of my game, but I share with you a great resource for learning to make your own.

Wylochs Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VWWu9Ny8cW8&t=3s

Join "The Fellowship" & Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Join Black Magic Craft on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

title: D&D Minis...Paper or Plastic?  (Black Magic Craft Episode 022)
